title: [llm benchmark] Add llama flash attentions & GPT3
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->

TODO:
+ [x] Fix chatglm intokens multi gpu training

```
export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=4
python benchmark.py --model_name_or_path gpt3-6.7B-en  \
    --num_train_epochs 1 --per_device_train_batch_size 4 \
    --fp16 \
    --lora \
    --english \
    --train_data_size 1000 \
    --fp16_opt_level O2 \
    --evaluation_strategy no --save_strategy no \
    --logging_steps 50 --output_dir outputs
```

```
python -m paddle.distributed.launch --gpus "4,5,6,7" benchmark.py --model_name_or_path gpt3-6.7B-en  \
    --num_train_epochs 1 --per_device_train_batch_size 8 \
    --train_data_size 1000 \
    --english \
    --evaluation_strategy no --save_strategy no \
    --fp16 --fp16_opt_level O2 --tensor_parallel_degree 4 \
    --logging_steps 50 --output_dir outputs
```

+ llama flash attention

```
export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=4
python benchmark.py --model_name_or_path  facebook/llama-7b \
    --num_train_epochs 1 --per_device_train_batch_size 16 \
    --lora \
    --fp16 \
    --english \
    --fp16_opt_level O2 \
    --use_flash_attention \
    --train_data_size 1000 \
    --evaluation_strategy no --save_strategy no \
    --logging_steps 50 --output_dir outputs
```

+ 实验结果

| Model         | Method   | Num GPUs | Batch Size | Paddle Setup | Paddle Effective Tokens/s | Torch Setup | Torch Effective Tokens/s | Speedup |
|---------------|----------|----------|------------|--------------|---------------------------|-------------|--------------------------|---------|
| gpt3-6.7b     | LoRA     | 1        | 4          |              |        3450.06            |             |       1186.74            | **191%**|
| gpt3-13b      | LoRA     | 1        | 4          |              |        2008.40            |             |       969.60             | **107%**|
| gpt3-6.7b     | Finetune | 4        | 8          |   MP 4       |        3301.49            |   ZeRO 2    |       1441.65            | **129%**|
| gpt3-13b      | Finetune | 4        | 8          |   MP 4       |        1890.38            |   ZeRO 2    |       783.26             | **141%**|
| gpt3-6.7b     | Finetune | 4        | 16         |   MP 4       |        4666.19            |   ZeRO 3    |       1756.42            | **166%**|

title: [blip2] Update blip2 to support fp16
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->

```
import paddle
from paddlenlp.transformers import Blip2Processor, Blip2ForConditionalGeneration, Blip2QFormerModel
from paddlenlp.transformers import Blip2VisionModel, Blip2Model, OPTModel
from PIL import Image
model_name_or_path="Salesforce/blip2-opt-2.7b"

model = Blip2ForConditionalGeneration.from_pretrained(model_name_or_path,load_state_as_np=True,dtype="float16")
processor = Blip2Processor.from_pretrained(model_name_or_path)
image = Image.open('000000039769.jpg')
prompt = "Question: how many cats are there? Answer:"

inputs = processor(images=image, text=prompt, return_tensors="pd")
inputs["pixel_values"] = paddle.to_tensor(inputs["pixel_values"],dtype="float16")
outputs = model(pixel_values=inputs["pixel_values"],input_ids=inputs["input_ids"])
```

title: [DO NOT MERGE][TaskFlow]Support llama & bloom taskflow
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
New features

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Models

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
在 taskflow 中支持 llama 和 bloom 等模型


```python
import time
import os
from paddlenlp import Taskflow
import numpy as np

path = "/path/to/static/weights"

# pre_caches = load_pre_cache_weight(path)
pre_caches = np.load(os.path.join(path, "pre_caches.npy"))

chatbot = Taskflow(
    "text2text_generation", 
    model="ziqingyang/chinese-alpaca-7b", 
    batch_size=1, 
    is_static_model=True,
    static_mode=True,
    prefix=True, 
    dtype='float16', 
    task_path=path,
    use_pre_caches=True
)

message = "类型#裙*版型#显瘦*风格#文艺*风格#简约*图案#印花*图案#撞色*裙下摆#压褶*裙长#连衣裙*裙领型#"
for i in range(10):
    start = time.perf_counter()
    output = chatbot(message, pre_caches_numpy=pre_caches)
    hf_cost = (time.perf_counter() - start) * 1000
    print("Speed Paddle:", hf_cost)
    print(len(output['result'][0]))
    print(output['result'][0])

```

title: fix unidiffuser scheduler for ddim and dpmsolver multistep
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
Bug fixes

### PR changes
Others

### Description
fix unidiffuser scheduler for ddim and dpmsolver multistep
```
import paddle
from paddlenlp.trainer import set_seed
from ppdiffusers import UniDiffuserPipeline, DPMSolverUniDiffuserScheduler, DDIMScheduler, DPMSolverMultistepScheduler

pipe = UniDiffuserPipeline.from_pretrained("thu-ml/unidiffuser")
pipe.scheduler = DPMSolverMultistepScheduler.from_config(pipe.scheduler.config)
# pipe.scheduler = DDIMScheduler.from_config('runwayml/stable-diffusion-v1-5/scheduler')
# pipe.scheduler = DDIMScheduler.from_config("CompVis/ldm-text2im-large-256/scheduler")

set_seed(42)
generator = paddle.Generator().manual_seed(0)

prompt = "an elephant under the sea"
image = pipe(mode="t2i", image=None, prompt=prompt).images[0]
image.save("vis.png")
```

body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
taskflow中text2text_generation支持通过指定model=THUDM/chatglm2-6b使用chatglm2
### PR changes
修改taskflow支持指定模型THUDM/chatglm2-6b。
text2text_generation文件中导入的 ChatGLMForCausalLM, ChatGLMTokenizer改为AutoTokenizer, AutoModelForCausalLM

### Description
通过代码已经验证通过。

```
import time
from paddlenlp import Taskflow
chatbot = Taskflow("text2text_generation", batch_size=2, dtype='float16', model ="THUDM/chatglm2-6b" )
message = "强改写：一群蚂蚁士兵冲向一块披萨"
for i in range(10):
    start = time.perf_counter()
    output = chatbot(message)
    hf_cost = (time.perf_counter() - start) * 1000
    print("Speed Paddle:", hf_cost)
    print(len(output['result'][0]))
    print(output['result'][0])
```

title: add Baichuan 7B/13B-base/13B-chat
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
import paddle
from paddlenlp.transformers import AutoModelForCausalLM, AutoTokenizer
from paddle.distributed import fleet

tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained('../paddle-baichuan/paddle-baichuan-13b-chat/')

tensor_parallel_degree = paddle.distributed.get_world_size()
tensor_parallel_rank = 0
if tensor_parallel_degree > 1:
    strategy = fleet.DistributedStrategy()
    strategy.hybrid_configs = {
        "dp_degree": 1,
        "mp_degree": tensor_parallel_degree,
        "pp_degree": 1,
        "sharding_degree": 1,
    }
    fleet.init(is_collective=True, strategy=strategy)
    hcg = fleet.get_hybrid_communicate_group()
    tensor_parallel_rank = hcg.get_model_parallel_rank()

model = AutoModelForCausalLM.from_pretrained('../paddle-baichuan/paddle-baichuan-13b-chat', 
                tensor_parallel_degree=tensor_parallel_degree,
                tensor_parallel_rank=tensor_parallel_rank,
				dtype='bfloat16')

input_ids = tokenizer('世界上第二高的山峰是哪座', return_tensors='pd')
#print(model(**input_ids))
output = model.generate(**input_ids, decode_strategy='greedy_search', max_length=150)
out = tokenizer.decode(output[0][0])
f = open('./res.txt', 'w+', encoding='utf8')
f.write(out)
f.close()
```
 山峰?
乔戈里峰。乔戈里峰海拔8611米,是世界上第二高峰,也是唯一一座海拔8000米以上的大峰,但攀登难度却远远超过K2峰,乔戈里峰地处喀喇昆仑山脉的中巴边境上,是中国和巴基斯坦的国境线。</s>
```

1. Support loading megatron dataset for [llm/llama](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/6489/files), [llm/gpt3](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/6489/files) and [model_zoo/gpt/run_pretrain_trainer.py.](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/6489/files)
2. Add [paddlenlp/data/indexed_dataset.py](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/6489/files) for megatron.
3. Add [paddlenlp/data/causal_dataset.py](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/6489/files) for llm.
4. Add [paddlenlp/data/blendable_dataset.py](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/6489/files) for multi-dataset.
5. Add [model_zoo/gpt/dataset.py](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/6489/files) so that [model_zoo/gpt/run_pretrain_trainer.py](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/6489/files) can load megatron dataset.
6. Add [model_zoo/gpt/legacy_dataset.py](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/6489/files) for [model_zoo/gpt/run_pretrain_static.py](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/6489/files) and [model_zoo/gpt/run_pretrain.py](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/6489/files).
7. Remove duplicate content in [ernie-1.0/data_tools](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/6489/files).
